aboutpara:
I am a passionate professional with an initial background in electrical engineering and industrial computing, complemented by a bachelor's and master's degree in logistics engineering. This diverse knowledge has allowed me to develop a holistic approach to problem-solving.

I chose to change careers to web development, motivated by my passion for technology and my constant desire to learn. Today, I thrive in this field, leveraging my technical skills and quickly
